{"id":1113012646,"question_id":3019,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"3 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1701793304,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1113012646/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Furthest Point From Origin","memory":"41.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int furthestDistanceFromOrigin(String moves) {\n\n        int ls = 0;\n        int rs = 0; \n\n        for (int i=0; i<moves.length(); i++)\n        {\n            switch (moves.charAt(i))\n            {\n                case 'L':\n                    ls++;\n                    break;\n                case 'R':\n                    rs++;\n                    break;\n            }\n        }\n\n        return Math.abs(ls - rs) + (moves.length() - ls - rs);\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"furthest-point-from-origin","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
